column1: This is what happens when we vote — we pave the way for lasting and formative change. Today has been nearly 100 years in the making. It’s time to ratify the #EqualRightsAmendment! 💪 https://t.co/oBmkSWZe97

One year ago today 11 lives were stolen in the Tree of Life synagogue. May we reflect on their lives. May their memories be a blessing.  Hate has no place in our neighborhoods. Today and every day I stand with our neighbors in the Jewish community. https://t.co/ERLdecZrQ7
One of the best things about serving in the 116th Congress is serving alongside these incredible women leaders. https://t.co/zkjofPYdsJ

BREAKING: We are officially @PPact endorsed for 2020! Fighting for a woman's right to make her own choices for her body and her family and have access to basic quality affordable health care is one of my highest priorities in Congress and I'm thrilled to have @PPact by my side. https://t.co/t9RePFVQuH

🚨🚨🚨The nonpartisan Congressional Budget Office is sounding the alarm about the effects of the President's trade war/tariff-happy trade policy:  - stifled economic growth - faster increases to the deficit - loss of nearly $600 in annual income for families https://t.co/XtROlgvzAr
It is. And it’s an emergency. https://t.co/IjxvZl0Q50

They tried this already! And proved that taking away people’s healthcare was incredibly unpopular. Instead they should join us in our efforts to  expand coverage make healthcare & Rx drugs affordable and protect people with pre-existing conditions.   https://t.co/p0BGmex4UB

.@FallonTonight more like getting friggin'...my last name..listening to constituents & touring local businesses!  But pls donate to the marg fund aka the help me stay in office so I can fix our messed up healthcare system & keep good jobs in America fund👉 https://t.co/5bUseoTKJ6 https://t.co/13m5AOvfIX

Had a great time over the weekend as a “mocktail” judge at the Justin Scheftel Memorial Softball Tournament. This was the 15th year of this event and it is an enduring legacy to Justin and his memory. https://t.co/G3RTq3UfYi
@MikeSchlossberg @RepSusanWild @RyanBizzarro @JasonOrtitay @peter_schweyer @SummerForPA @RepDanielle @Innamo @RepOMara @RepKenyatta Just not sure can beat Wild for Congress and @mad4pa 🤷‍♀️

On the campaign trail I promised to work hard for folks in #PA07 who work harder everyday to support their families and their communities.  Spending my time on the drama of DC won’t lower the cost of healthcare or put more money in their pockets at the end of the month. https://t.co/LtHwpfUIAl

I’m proud to have their endorsement and will never give up the fight in Congress to protect the environment and fight the devastating effects of climate change - that’s why I’m a co-chair of the @NewDemCoalition’s Climate Change Task Force and proudly voted for #ClimateActionNow

BIG NEWS: I’ve been endorsed by @LCVoters - LCV has been vital to holding our leaders accountable in the fight to combat climate change preserve our planet for the next generation and protect the water we drink and the air we breathe. https://t.co/KBNQ3Sn7hN

I owe a big thank you to my Pennsylvania colleague from across the aisle @GT_TeamGT for leading this effort with me. With the passage of #StrongerCAPTA and pieces of the SPEAK UP Act we can move toward our shared goal of protecting Pennsylvania's children.

Yesterday the House passed parts of my bill the SPEAK UP Act to improve the reporting process for cases of child abuse and neglect. In PA - and across the country - we are all too familiar with the tragedies that occur when the right people are not alerted as soon as possible.

Polls are open across the #LehighValley! If you are a registered Democrat or Republican go out & #BeAVoter for the primary candidates you want to see in the general election. From judges mayors DAs city & county council & school board - these local officials are SO important https://t.co/MC4zy00pzU

Last night the House voted to keep our promise to lower the cost of prescription drugs & shore up the ACA to lower healthcare costs & protect people with pre-existing conditions. You sent me here to #ProtectOurCare & I’ll keep fighting to do just that.   https://t.co/iN6a8w2RXc

Thank you @GovernorTomWolf. The government has no place limiting women’s access to healthcare.   This is an important reminder that women’s reproductive rights are always on the ballot. https://t.co/8YhWH5h8KG

🚩A bill to allow students w/ high interest rates refinance their loans (federal & private) to a much lower more affordable a rate (of 3.76)  🚩And a bill to require loan providers to be transparent & clear about a borrowers’ obligations & legal rights before agreeing to a loan.

That's why I'm using my seat at the @EdLaborCmte table to ensure we are working to make college more affordable and inclusive to begin with - and am cosponsoring several bills to help people already saddled with student loan debt including:

I was home for two weeks meeting with constituents all over #PA07 & one thing I heard over & over again: Student Loan Debt is Holding Young People Back. It's preventing them from pursuing further education buying homes saving money. And it's a crisis.

This is exactly what I - and the new Dem majority - was elected to fight. We will not allow the ACA to be dismantled and will fight tooth and nail to bring down the cost of healthcare and protect people with pre-existing conditions.

The ACA made healthcare affordable to millions of Americans for the 1st time offered historic protections for millions w/ pre-existing conditions & affirmed the belief that healthcare is a right not a privilege for only those who can afford it. https://t.co/cvDlzgaP7O

Freedom of press is essential to holding our govt accountable to the people.   As DC prepares for the @WHCA dinner tonight I'm proud to stand w/ my colleagues in support of #FreePress - and to demand this admin and all future admins be accessible to the press with H.Res.325 👇 https://t.co/4bX9qE6mI9

Had a great time this morning at the @HRC Leadership Summit with my friend and colleague @JenniferWexton. HRC has been a driving force for change and progress moving the needle on LGBTQ rights for decades. I’m so proud to stand with them as a member of the @LGBTEqCaucus. https://t.co/lB5ahiYlCb

We know the voters of SE PA did not send us to Washington to join the partisan fray or perpetuate the status quo of putting special interests before people. [They] voted for change & we have both the honor & responsibility to serve the families & communities of this region 1st.” https://t.co/37briVN5l2,2019-04-16 18:50:35,Twitter for iPhone,1,13
I had the pleasure of joining the Lehigh Valley Labor Council for their annual dinner and - frankly - couldn’t think of a better way to spend my Saturday evening.   So proud to be your partner in Congress and in the @EdLaborCmte fighting for working families in #PA07. https://t.co/KpIvtLShov,2019-04-15 00:07:58,Twitter for iPhone,4,17
Last time I talked to @merionwest I was a candidate. This time I spoke with them as a Congresswoman. A few things have changed - my schedule is even crazier and I wear this fancy pin but my priorities for #PA07 are the same.   Read the whole piece here 👉 https://t.co/jZjhPFhy7h https://t.co/vjE6P8VUiX,2019-04-05 17:16:10,Twitter for iPhone,3,4
Who run the world? Women! And a lot more of them thanks to the tireless efforts of @emilyslist in 2018.   Thanks for that and thanks for an amazing night of inspiring women leaders. #WeAreEMILY #RepresentationMatters https://t.co/kFMm9J7yoN,2019-04-05 14:06:32,Twitter for iPhone,1,19
If any state can relate it's PA where - until redistricting - gerrymandered districts looked more like cartoon characters than Congressional districts.  Thank you @ReElectNydia for taking the no corporate PAC $$ pledge! Together we can make the government work #ForThePeople. https://t.co/OSeVbdEknH,2019-04-02 17:14:37,Twitter for iPhone,1,7
And more leaders like you @ReElectNydia! https://t.co/qhkGuNmZJD,2019-04-01 19:34:37,Twitter for iPhone,0,6
“I don’t take it personally but I worry about a lot of younger women my daughter and others and I don’t want to see them exposed to that.”  This is why the #PaycheckFairnessAct is so important. People in power still underestimate women and we must keep fighting for #EqualPay. https://t.co/VzDO21CvcO,2019-03-31 23:23:47,Twitter for iPhone,1,16
Families are paying astronomical rates & at risk of losing their coverage - this is unacceptable.   I promised #PA07 that protecting people w/ pre-existing conditions & lowering health care costs would be my number one priority. I’ll keep that promise.   https://t.co/uw3AEmH6dI,2019-03-29 17:33:37,Twitter for iPhone,4,9
I welcome this ruling to protect Americans from junk plans - the ACA put these protections in place to keep employers from getting away with providing these cheap bare bones plans because they don’t cover some of the most basic care like maternity care and prescription drugs. https://t.co/Z2PFVdBdxI,2019-03-29 13:58:08,Twitter for iPhone,2,10
After practicing law for 30+ years this wasn’t the 1st time someone tried to avoid an argument over the merits of the law by trying to dismiss me. Fortunately this amendment to undermine the #PaycheckFairnessAct didn’t pass  but we did pass #EqualPay.  https://t.co/zt2CQJmjXc,2019-03-28 21:46:56,Twitter for iPhone,9,25
BIG NEWS: I have been endorsed by @StopBigMoney.   I refuse to take corporate PAC money and worked so hard to pass #HR1 because I promised my voters I will answer only to them - not to corporations or special interests. I'll be keeping that promise! #ECUEndorsed https://t.co/YdLbeCNd6O,2019-03-20 19:11:23,Twitter for iPhone,7,23
Meeting face to face with my constituents - especially the young engaged constituents who are driving the #YouthVote - is so important to me. From the student debt crisis to climate change this generation will pay the price if we don't act now.  https://t.co/DCsasINyDN,2019-03-20 16:58:47,Twitter for iPhone,0,8
Nobody said running for Congress without corporate PAC money would be easy. In fact people tried to talk me out of it - people are still trying to talk me out of it. But I'm not here to do what's easy I'm here to do what's right.   I'll be keeping my promise.,2019-03-16 23:07:57,Twitter for iPhone,5,46
I promised my voters I'll answer only to them in Congress - not to corporations or special interests - but to families in #PA07 who are counting on me to fight for their health care their jobs & their planet. That's why I refuse to take corporate PAC $$. https://t.co/s9lCf4Aq3N,2019-03-16 23:07:57,Twitter for iPhone,7,43
Thank you @CheriBustos! https://t.co/vX7u3e7n5D,2019-03-05 00:33:31,Twitter for iPhone,0,4
$1 trillion+ in student debt is crushing young Americans. This crisis is holding back an entire generation from participating in the economy buying homes getting married and achieving the American Dream. We have an obligation to fix this ASAP.  https://t.co/UpB5kU5kcQ”,2019-03-04 14:09:40,Twitter for iPhone,4,16
So despite historic success by my #FabFour sisters we have a lot of work to do to create parity in PA politics to ensure women of all stripes are represented by their local state and federal elected officials.,2019-03-03 19:50:23,Twitter for iPhone,2,8
Important note by @PennCapitalStar in this piece: ....Women hold only a 1/4 of the state’s legislative seats & no statewide offices. PA has never elected a woman to the U.S. Senate & women of color & R women are especially underrepresented."

“We’re all very different but we do share the idea that we will go farther and succeed legislatively even better as we help one another" - @mad4pa on working together now that we are off the campaign trail & in the halls of Congress. Couldn't agree more.  https://t.co/W8u6vMDaM6

“I don’t think anybody with political aspiration or in politics should have anything do with how those maps are drawn" - last night at the @Muhlenberg Town Hall on redistricting. Voters should be picking their politicians - not the other way around.  https://t.co/ISRvIOEbvs

You have to work to represent everybody as much as possible... A lot of people think compromise is a dirty word and I don’t believe it to be. We are not clones of one another. - talking w/ @LVB_com on why I love representing a purple district like #PA07  https://t.co/S1UbtU87VQ

I don't take corporate PAC money because I want the people of #PA07 to know that I am on their side - that I can't be swayed by big donations from corporations looking out for their profit margins. I am answering only to people looking out for the well-being of their families.

I ran on a promise to get the government back to work #ForthePeople. #HR1 is sweeping government reform that will do just that by fighting the culture of corruption expanding access to the ballot box and reducing the influence of dark money.   https://t.co/qdEi4sVzUs

Improving the lives of working families starts with creating an economy that works for everyone - not just those at the top. That means raising the minimum wage closing the #paygap and protecting our unions.   To #PA07 I promise I’m working on all of the above.

We are long - looong - overdue for raising the minimum wage. America's workers deserve a raise and gradually increasing the minimum wage is an important first step to tackling income inequality. #RaisetheWage https://t.co/Xde1PR4IOT

🚨🚨🚨Today is the last day to submit a comment on the Department of Education's proposed rule changes to #TitleIX which would make reporting sexual harassment or assault on campus more difficult and our schools less safe. To submit a comment: https://t.co/QsqiwQOmls

Gun violence in America is so prevalent it has stopped making front page news.   How has it gotten to this point without action from Congress? Grateful that the new majority in the House is making gun reform a top priority.   https://t.co/b9wRnbEhZT
